title: 137: The Beat Burnout & Boost Your Energy Episode
itunes:title: The Beat Burnout & Boost Your Energy Episode
description: In this week’s episode, Lisa talks to Dr. Amy Shah about how to boost your energy to get through the day! She has tips for how to improve gut health, how to start your day with one simple task, the best foods for breaking a fast, and SO MUCH MORE! Plus, she explains what circadian fasting is and how it works. Go ahead and push play now. Then when you’re done, head on over to our Foodcast page for more from Dr. Shah!
itunes:summary: This is a NOT TO MISS episode as Lisa sits down with Dr. Amy Shah, author of I’m So Effing Tired: A Proven Plan to Beat Burnout, Boost Your Energy and Reclaim Your Life.
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
